PAD_DefeatedKetheric_0.speaker: Player
PAD_DefeatedKetheric_0.text: An elder brain... That was the Heart of the Absolute?
PAD_DefeatedKetheric_0.context: NodeContext: Almost to self, processing this information

PAD_DefeatedKetheric_1.speaker: Player
PAD_DefeatedKetheric_1.text: Come. There is much to discuss - but we need not do it in this rotting place.
PAD_DefeatedKetheric_1.context: NodeContext: Weary - we've fought a huge battle and learned some deep revelations, but she wants to get to a place of safety before going into it

PAD_DefeatedKetheric_2.speaker: Player
PAD_DefeatedKetheric_2.text: At last, it is done. Ketheric Thorm will rise no more. All those who did not live to see this day can finally rest.

PAD_DefeatedKetheric_3.speaker: Player
PAD_DefeatedKetheric_3.text: Ketheric Thorm is dead - really dead, this time. Lady Shar's justice has been delivered.

PAD_DefeatedKetheric_4.speaker: Player
PAD_DefeatedKetheric_4.text: He's dead. He's finished. But Gortash... Gortash was here.
PAD_DefeatedKetheric_4.context: NodeContext: She's stunned and almost disbelieving Gortash is behind this

PAD_DefeatedKetheric_6.speaker: Player
PAD_DefeatedKetheric_6.text: The transformation Ketheric underwent was... horrifying. So powerful, but so grotesque.

PAD_DefeatedKetheric_5.speaker: Player
PAD_DefeatedKetheric_5.text: There was barely anything of the man left, even before we finished him.

PAD_DefeatedKetheric_7.speaker: Player
PAD_DefeatedKetheric_7.text: Ketheric Thorm's demise was the deathblow against the Shadow Curse also. We have done all that was asked about us. Thaniel will soon take care of the rest.
PAD_DefeatedKetheric_7.context: NodeContext: Pleased. On the cusp of victory at last.

PAD_DefeatedKetheric_8.speaker: Player
PAD_DefeatedKetheric_8.text: Controlling an elder brain... Such power.
PAD_DefeatedKetheric_8.context: NodeContext: Almost to self, processing this information. A sense cogs are whirrig, but we don't yet know the reason
